product_name: Wilderness Press Big Sur and Ventana Wilderness Map
long_description: Discover the beautiful wilderness area that is Big Sur. Also covers Andrew Molera, Pfeiffer Big Sur, Julia Pfeiffer Burns and Lime Kiln State Parks, as well as Silver Peak Wilderness. Detailed topo map includes: roads, trails, campgrounds trailheads, trail camps, parking, picnic areas, springs, streams and other points of interest. Waterproof map measures 40 x 24.5 inches.
short_description: Discover the beautiful wilderness area that is Big Sur.
